name: Thinkfulness
0:
”Alexa, open check thinkfulness and tell thought for today”
”What should I think this week”
”What's my thought for the day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.

des: THINK to live a meaningful, purpose driven, happy and satisfied life by listening to teaching of some of the greatest philosophers, preachers and teachers in human civilization.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
